title: Invasion onslaught premade 5 for missions
body:
Hi all, I'm looking for some peeps to do the invasion onslaught missions with me and my friend. We can play pretty much any of the champs to suit team comp. We're looking to complete all the missions that require a premade 5 but are happy to help with any others that you may still need to complete. Reply here if interested or add me on league- glaicie.

EDIT: We have a 5 premade as of now. Sorry to anyone who's looking for a group, best try another discussion thread/group

replies.body: Hi, I am searching for team for all premade missions too. Add me if you need someone :)
yo i just got the s rank mission left if you need help add me
